name: Joanie
description:
Cook potato soup and break your grandmother’s old friend out of the nursing home.

Cook, dance, and sneak through the lives of Tennessee robots and their culinary flights. It’s a large world: make it smaller. Go get Winnie out of the nursing home.

Available for Real and Virtual Realities.

------------------------

For VR: It's a seated experience, and requires hand controllers (Vive or Oculus touch). I set my height to 4 feet. Choose either the Teleport or Walking build depending on your comfort level.

------------------------

For RR: WASD to move. Left click to interact and to sing.

I hope you enjoy!
